thread.title: Mr Andy Henshaw
thread.title_full: Axminster Tools & Machinery reviewed by Mr Andy Henshaw

author: Mr Andy Henshaw
title: Mr Andy Henshaw
text: Ordered a Makina drill on standard mail (3-5 working days). Confirmation of receipt of order, then dispstch, then track my parcel, precise (1 hour delivery slot) met the delivery guy at the gates just 36 hours after ordering. This is my first order with Axminster but it certainly won't be my last - simply fantastic experience.
